name: Microtel Inn & Suites by Wyndham Cherokee

reviews.text: We stayed at the Microtell Inn & Suites in Cherokee,North Carolina on Saturday,March 3,2012,for a night of Bingo and Casino Fun with some of my best friends.I checked in effortlessly before the allowable 3 o'clock check-in.The hotel staff was very friendly and accomodating,placing our group on the first floor.The lobby was clean,with many anemities available such as high speed internet,continental breakfast,24 hour coffee and fresh fruit.I was satisfied with the room with the exception that a previous guest had left their pet in the bathroom creating scratches on the wallpaper and door.I did report this to the manager who was very attentive and concerned.This property is well maintained and is centraly located for tourist,casino visitors and the Bingo Parlor.I am a fan of Microtel Inn &Suites,but I thought the room rate was on the high side.The facility is one of the better motels in Cherokee if you can not stay at the Casino.I would like to compliment the breakfast attendant,a sweet young lady who geniunely cared about the hotel guests and their request.The Desk Manager was also very interested in our stay and mentioned Trip Advisor Site as a reference.I would recommend this property to anyone coming to Cherokee,Nc for a lodging preference.
reviews.title: Bingo and Harrahs with Special Friends
Very clean rooms and friendly staff
reviews.text: I always stay at this hotel when in Cherokee. It's easily accessible and walking distance to most every thing you need. Very clean rooms and the staff is over the top! Nice breakfast too!!

The Microtel hotel was amazing! I have not had a better experience anywhere else. I came into town for a quick weekend get-away and stayed here because it was near the Casino. The staff was awesome! Nice people and extremely helpful. The staff helped with suggestions of places to go, things to do and were very helpful with a few things I left behind at home. The rooms are very very clean and the continental breakfast was def. a huge plus! I will recommend this hotel to any of my friends and family that come to Cherokee. :)
reviews.title: Great Stay!

reviews.text: Stayed in the hotel in January 2012. Needed a room with 2 queen beds and they had it.
reviews.title: Nice winter stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nice clean room, pleasant stuff, good breakfast
reviews.title: Pretty good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel, along with 10 others, during April 2012 as part of a 17 day road trip across GA, NC, SC. By giving the star rating I am not saying the hotel is a 4 star but whether it was clean and value for the money and to an extent we have compared then to the other 10 hotels we stayed at.
reviews.title: Bring your own beer

reviews.text: Unlike some others this Microtel was more like a proper hotel were you park as near the reception as possible and take your luggage through the reception to a lift to your room. This felt much safer to us than the motel types were your room door is accessible to all from the street.
reviews.title: Microtel Inn & Suites great place to stay

reviews.text: On arrival we were allocated room 116 which was next to a vending/ice machine room, this was very noisy. We informed the reception who did, after being insistent, change us to room 204 which was much better.
reviews.title: Nice and Clean

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was clean, clean towels, lots of hot water and seemed well maintained.
reviews.title: Good value

reviews.text: The included breakfast offered a good choice although there was limited seating. A lot of people just took food and coffee back to their rooms.
reviews.title: Stay was average - nothing special

reviews.text: The staff was very helpful and courteous.Rooms were very neat and clean. Nice variety at the continental breakfast. Convenient to casino, grocery store and fast food restaurants. Would stay here again. ( Only complaint was the heater was somewhat noisy in our room.)
reviews.title: Comfortable stay

reviews.text: Every bit as good as the other Microtels we have stayed at. Got the seniors' rate without asking. Rooms a bit larger than other MTLS.
reviews.title: Good place to stay in the Smokies.

reviews.text: Clean, good staff. I'm not so sure about area restaurants. There is an Indian-American Casino nearby. We did not go, based on many of the reviews. Some really cool winding mountain roads in the area.
reviews.title: A good night's stay...

reviews.text: MIcrotel Inn & Suites is a good bang for your buck! We've stayed twice in December 2011-- a room with 2 queen sized beds and a suite with a queen & pull our sofa-- and enjoyed ourselves each time. The rooms are nicely situated, offer the same amenities as a higher-end hotel, and are extremely comfortable. Everyone of our party had a good night's rest so we could be up about our day of sight-seeing and visiting local family. The pool was quite small, but it was as warm as a bathtub....ahhhhh! They served a nice continental breakfast and the lobby/ food area was clean and tidy. If you're looking for an inexpensive, comfortable night's stay you can't do better than Microtel!
reviews.title: Excellant

reviews.text: The hotel was very clean. The staff was so friendly and caring about our needs. Will definitely stay there in the future. :-D
reviews.title: clean and comfortable and PET FRIENDLY

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed one night while visiting the casino. Staff was freindly and helpful. Room was clean and comfortable. Overall good stay. Price paid was $80 plus tax. A little higher than other Microtels I have stayed in.
reviews.title: Nice & freindly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nice motel, friendly staff, close to the casino, nears stores and eating establishments. The only draw back to this motel is there no view of the mountains or rivers that surround the area.
reviews.title: We stay here often

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I always check Tripadvisor for ratings on motels, and this was no exception.The reviews were spot on! VERY good staff, nice room, DID find a few hairs housekeeping missed on the bathroom floor, overall very clean. Wife had a stain on her sheet, which may or may not have been old. It appeared to be blood, and not pre-treated well.
reviews.title: Very good property, worth the ratings.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was very well presented, and coffee was very good.
reviews.title: Nice two day stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Unfortunately, the pool was closed, and since I had made a reservation online, the price was non-refundable, or I would have gone somewhere which had an open pool. I was looking forward to a swim all day! I admit to a bit of disappointment there. No mention was made of that when I made the reservation.
reviews.title: Awesome Hotel & Service

description: Microtel Inn & Suites offers 63 guest rooms with queen beds, smoking or non-smoking, pet friendly, outdoor pool open seasonally. Walk to many area restaurants. Free WIFI, free local and long distance calls, free deluxe Continental breakfast. In-room coffee, hairdryer, security safe and cable. Clean rooms and friendly staff!
